name: Heretic's Fork - Prototype
description:
Wishlist the full game on Steam!

Heretic's Fork is a roguelike deckbuilding horde survival tower defence.

Rifts between earth and hell have opened, pick a demon and use their card deck to create a monsterous tower, capable of keeping endless hordes of sinners from escaping hell. Expand and refine your deck to become a relentless murdering machine, punish the heretics and return them to their torment

Use unique cards to add new sections to your tower, create demonic garrison units, trigger holy effects, and much more.

Fill the meter with sinner blood to gain the favor of the gods, allowing you to pull new cards from your deck.

Grab cards from your collection and add them to your deck, with intention to create a deck that can break the game with interesting and unexpected synergies.


Unlock new cards that will appear in future runs, and new starter decks with special buffs that hint towards new synergies to try out. Become more and more powerful with every run, eventually becoming an overpowered monstrocity that can defeat endless waves of heretics.
